about_the_game:
Enrich your gaming experience with the Asteroid - Expansion Pass!


The Asteroid Expansion Pass will be available for purchase starting 08/26/2022.

To access additional content, you must own Asteroid for Steam.
Content packs are not available for purchase separately.
The additional contents will be usable only after their release.
Additional content not listed below may be distributed with the Expansion Pass.

The Expansion Pass contains:
- x1 Expansion Pass exclusive ship style
- x990 Aquanium Gems
- x1000 Flact

Coming in 2023

- New exclusive content and planets!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (64-bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux (64-bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel Macs, Rosetta on Apple silicon Macs
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Intel Macs, Rosetta on Apple silicon Macs
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

name: Asteroid - Expansion Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-bit)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
